 Manganese can be obtained from manganese oxide (MnO) from metal supply shops. 
 Phosphorus can be procured from various chemical suppliers that provide elemental phosphorus.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 40 g of calcium. 
 2. Measure 20 g of manganese oxide. 
 3. Measure 12 g of phosphorus. 
 4. Combine all measured powders in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer to thoroughly mix the ingredients until an even consistency is achieved.
